relation: Anonymous Joined: Nov 03, 2005 Posts: 69138 Other Topics

Posted Feb 26, 2002 at 10:01:37 PM Subject: TutoringConsulting Help Available Online I am available to provide online tutoring for your child with LD difficulty. I can help you by providing ways to adapt homework assignments, providing information on ways to help your child with their trouble areas, and giving tips on getting through the work. I can help your child with work in the same way. This is all done in real time (like a chat room) so you get immediate feedback. $20.00 an hour. If you are interested please email me so we can set up a time. I use the website tutor.com so I need to know when to log into it and tell you how to go through the process to get tutoring. I can also provide more in depth counseling than I do here or in email and advice about your child's difficulties and give some feedback on issues to address in annual IEP meetings.
